snippet: The investment firm reported earned $356.6 million in adjusted profit, as the private equity industry suffered from a slowdown in deal-making.
abstract: The investment firm reported earned $356.6 million in adjusted profit, as the private equity industry suffered from a slowdown in deal-making.
lead_paragraph: Apollo Global Management reported that earnings fell 61 percent for its fourth quarter, as the private equity industry suffered from a slowdown in deal-making.
